daily_fact: Former NYC Mayor Eric Adams encourages open dialogue and support, reminding everyone of the importance of seeking help during challenging times, as he addressed Andy Cohen's recent concerns.
topline_md: New York City faces a surge in flu hospitalizations, while the MTA implements fare hikes; additionally, a significant merger in the banking sector and a historic proclamation for Muslim American Heritage Month mark notable developments as the new year begins.
